title: Gorgeous Penthouse 1 BR w/ Views, Lndry in Unit, Incl Ht & H.W.
posting_body: ['CAMBRIDGE – CENTRAL SQUARE', 'Price:', '$3,865', 'Available:', 'Now.', '1 BEDROOM - 1 BATH', 'Gorgeous, penthouse 1 bedroom with views near Central Square.', 'Modern, galley kitchen with stainless steel appliances.', 'Large living/dining room.', 'Hardwood floors in living areas and carpeting in bedroom.', 'Walk-in closet.', 'Central air and laundry in unit.', 'Amenities include: 24-hr concierge, fitness room and community room.', 'Garage parking for $325/month.', 'Pets welcome: cat $40/month, dog $85/month (breed restrictions apply).', 'Heat and hot water included in the rent.', 'No smoking allowed.', 'Listing# 12332673', '**NOTE: Price and availability, subject to change, without notice.', '**', 'Century 21 Avon', '1675 Massachusetts Ave.', 'Cambridge, MA 02138', '617-661-8400', 'E-mail: Click "Reply" button above.']
